japanese:
あー、お腹いっぱいだ。
今日は遊んで疲れたし、このまま寝ちゃおうかな。
translation:
Ah, I'm full.
I played a lot today, so I'm tired.
I'm gonna hit the hay just like this.

japanese: 食べてすぐ寝ると体によくないぞ。
translation: It's not good for your body to sleep right after eating.

japanese:
おやおや、フータロー君は
勉強以外に体調管理までしてくれるの？
熱心な先生だねぇ。
translation:
Oh? Are you going to manage my health
as well as my study habits, Futaro-kun?
What a passionate teacher.

japanese:
な、なあ、食後の軽い運動がてら……
その……一緒に散歩しないか？
translation:
H-hey, I'd like some light exercise
after our meal...
Um...wanna take a walk together?

japanese: うん、いいよ。
translation: Okay, fine.

japanese: えっ、いいのか？
translation: It is? Really?

japanese:
おかしなフータロー君だなぁ。
君が誘ったんじゃない、喜んでおつきあいするよ。
translation:
You're acting strange, Futaro-kun.
You invited me, so I happily accept your offer.

japanese:
ああ、わかった！
じゃあ、そのあたりをぶらっとするか。
translation:
Okay, I got it!
So, let's just head over there.

japanese:
どうせならビーチまで行ってみない？
私、夜の海が見たいな。
translation:
Let's at least go to the beach, okay?
I want to see the ocean at night.

japanese: わかった、行こう。
translation: No problem, let's go.

japanese:
夜の海って思った以上に暗いよね。
でも、星明かりが反射して、なんだか幻想的。
translation:
The sea at night is darker than I expected,
but the starlight reflects off it.
It's kind of magical.

japanese: 危ないから海には入るなよ？
translation: It's dangerous, so don't go in, okay?

japanese: 足首が浸かるくらいなら平気じゃない？
translation: I could go up to my ankles, couldn't I?

japanese:
わからんぞ？
波打ち際に、海難事故で死んだ人の幽霊がきて
引きずり込まれる、なんてあるかもしれない。
translation:
I dunno.
On the edge of the waves, the ghost of a person
who died in an accident at sea may come and drag you in.

japanese:
その話、五月ちゃんならビックリだろうけど
私には通用しないぞ～？
translation:
That might shock Itsuki-chan,
but not me, you know?

japanese:
（今はいつもの一花だな。
　さて、どう切り出したものか……）
translation:
(This is the Ichika I know.
 So, how do I approach this...)

japanese: そういえば、昨日も一緒に星空を見上げたよね。
translation:
Come to think of it,
we looked up at the starry sky together yesterday.

japanese:
あ、ああ。
そうだな、俺が教えたことは覚えてるか？
translation:
Y-yeah.
That's right, do you remember what I told you?

japanese:
もちろん。
あのあたりに、夏の大三角形があるんだよね。
translation:
Of course.
The Great Summer Triangle is over there, isn't it?

japanese: ちゃんと星の名前も覚えてるか？
translation: Do you remember the names of the stars?

japanese: 織姫と彦星。
translation: Orihime and Hikoboshi.

japanese: あと１つは？
translation: And the third?

japanese:
忘れちゃったな。
もう１回教えてくれる？　ね？
translation:
I forgot.
Could you tell me one more time?

japanese: お、おい、そんなに近づくなよ。
translation: H-hey, don't get so close to me.

japanese:
ねえ、フータロー君。
いま私たち、２人っきりだよ？
translation:
Hey, Futaro-kun.
It's just you and me here, you know?

japanese: あ、ああ……そうだが……。
translation: Y-yeah...that's true, but...

japanese:
だから、どんな話をしても
みんなに聞かれないですむわけだ。
translation:
So, no matter what we talk about,
the others won't hear us.
Wha...

japanese:
でしょ？
そのために来たんだよね？
translation:
Right?
That's why you came, didn't you?

japanese:
くっ……。
いつからバレてたんだ？
translation:
Urk...
How long have you known?

japanese:
フータロー君が、
ぎこちなく私を散歩に誘ってくれたときから。
translation: Since you awkwardly invited me for a walk, Futaro-kun.

japanese: 最初からじゃねぇか……。
translation: From the very start, then...

japanese:
むしろ、その前の食事中からかな。
フータロー君、何か言いたげな顔して
チラチラ見てくるんだもん。
translation:
Actually, I think it's from during the meal before that.
Futaro-kun, you kept glancing at me
looking like you wanted to say something.

japanese:
……なんかもう恥ずかしくなってきたんだが。
やっぱり素人じゃ、演技のプロは騙せないな。
translation:
...I'm pretty embarrassed right now.
As expected, an amateur can't fool a pro.

japanese:
ううん。
私も、フータロー君やみんなに
気づかれちゃってたし、おあいこだよ。
translation:
No.
Everyone has noticed that I'm behaving
a little strangely, so we're square.
Ahh...

japanese:
そういうことでしょ？
みんなに、話を聞いてあげてほしいって
頼まれたんじゃない？
translation:
That's what's going on, right?
Everyone wanted you to talk to me
so they could hear what I had to say.

japanese: ……お前は察しがよくて助かる。
translation: ...Your guesses are so good. What a big help.

japanese:
ううん、君やみんながすごく優しいから、
その気持ちが伝わってきてるだけ。
translation:
No, you and everyone are so kind,
I could tell how you felt about me.

japanese:
あーあ、でも、少し演技の自信なくなるな。
心配かけないようにしてたつもりなのに。
translation:
Aaaah, but, I've lost confidence
in my acting abilities a little.
I intended to not worry anyone.

japanese: フータロー君ですら騙せてないくらいだしね。
translation: I couldn't even fool you, Futaro-kun.

japanese:
ここは撮影所じゃないんだ。
ずっと演技し続けられる人間なんていないだろ。
translation:
We aren't filming anything here.
There's no person alive who could just keep acting.

japanese:
それにな、毎回、演技でごまかせるほど
悩みってもんは簡単じゃないだろ？
translation:
Besides, it can't be easy to worry about
putting on a show for us every time, right?
Hm...

japanese:
さっき、みんなには聞かれないですむと
言ってたし……話してくれるんだよな？
translation:
You said earlier that people wouldn't hear us...
Would you talk to me, then?

japanese: うん、君がよければ聞いてほしい。
translation: Yes, if you're okay, I want to tell you.

japanese: もちろんだ。
translation: Of course.

japanese:
実はね、昼間、私がスマホで見てたのは、
次の仕事の台本データなんだ。
translation:
Actually, what I was looking at on my smartphone
today was script data for my next job.

japanese:
移動のときとか、時間があったら
目を通しておこうと思って入れておいたの。
translation:
I thought I'd take a look at it
when I was commuting or if I had time.

japanese:
でも、この島に着いてから、
仕事のことを考える余裕はほとんどなかった。
translation:
However, since coming to the island,
I haven't had a lot of free time to think about my job.

japanese: それは……生きるのが最優先だから仕方ないだろ。
translation:
Well...we had to prioritize survival,
so it can't be helped.

japanese:
けどさ、事務所や現場からすれば、
仕事にとんでもない穴を開けてる役者ってことに
なるよね。
translation:
But from eyes of the office and the set,
I'll be an actress who caused a huge delay for them.

japanese:
私のせいで撮影が延期されたりしたら、
賠償問題になっちゃうかもしれない。
translation:
If the shooting was postponed because of me,
there could be a compensation issue as well.

japanese:
賠償って……。
事情が事情だぞ？
お前だって好きで穴を開けるわけじゃないのに。
translation:
Compensation...
It is what it is, stuff happens sometimes, don't they?
You didn't cause any trouble because you wanted to.

japanese:
世の中は色々と難しいってことだよ。
個人の事情よりも優先されることがあるんだ。
translation:
The world is difficult,
and sometimes it takes precedence
over personal circumstances.

japanese:
まあ、そうなったらそうなったで、
クライアントと話し合って
解決することになると思う。
translation:
Well, if that happens,
I think we'll be able to discuss it with the client
and work it out.

japanese:
なんとか解決できても、私や事務所の信用は
下がっちゃって、これから先の仕事に
影響は出るかもしれないけどね。
translation:
Yet, even if the problem's somehow solved,
it will reduce my credibility and the office's,
and it may affect my future work.

japanese:
いや、どうしてフータロー君がそんな顔するのさ。
なんで怒ってるの？
translation:
Well, why are you making that face, Futaro-kun?
Are you mad?

japanese:
怒ってるんじゃない。
自分のふがいなさにイラついてんだよ。
translation:
I'm not mad.
I'm just annoyed at how useless I am.

japanese:
俺にはお前を守るすべがない。
ここで苦労して来たお前が、さらに問題を
背負い込まされても見てることしかできない。
translation:
I have no way to protect you.
I can only watch you struggle here and now,
and moreover, burden yourself with even more problems.

japanese: ねえ、なんで守ろうとするのかな？
translation: Hey, why do you want to protect me?

japanese: は？
translation: Huh?

japanese: 別にそれはフータロー君の役目じゃなくない？
translation: That's not really your role, is it?

japanese:
君は、あくまで家庭教師。
なのに私の女優としての立場まで心配する必要ある？
translation:
You're just our tutor.
Do you really need to worry about my work
as an actress?

japanese: ……ある。
translation: ...I do.

japanese:
へえ？
どうしてあるのか聞かせてもらってもいい？
translation:
Really, now?
May I ask you why?

japanese:
俺の、家庭教師としての第一の目標は、
お前らを５人揃って卒業させることだ。
そのために雇われた。
translation:
My primary goal as your tutor
is to get all five of you to graduate.
That's why I was hired.

japanese: うん、そうだね。
translation: Yeah, that's right.

japanese:
俺は、卒業ってのは
その先の道を見つけてこそだと思っている。
そして一花、お前はすでに道は見つけてるよな。
translation:
I think graduation is meant
for one to find your way in life.
Ichika, you've already found your way.

japanese:
もちろん。
女優が、私の進むべき道だよ。
translation:
Of course.
The path of the actress is the one for me.

japanese:
そうやって、なんの迷いもなく
言いきれるほどの行き先を、失うかもしれないんだ。
……心配しないわけがないだろ。
translation:
Speaking like that without any hesitation,
you might lose your way.
...There's no way I wouldn't worry.

japanese: 失うって、大げさだな。
translation: Lose my way? That's a total exaggeration.

japanese:
可能性はゼロじゃないだろ？
失わないにしても、本来はなかったはずの
苦労が待っているんだ。
translation:
But not impossible, right?
Even if you don't lose it, you're going to have some
trouble that shouldn't have been there in the first place.

japanese:
……ふふっ！
フータロー君って実は面倒見がいいよね。
そんなんじゃ、損してばかりになるかもよ？
translation:
...Teehee!
You're actually very caring, Futaro-kun.
That might make you be on the losing end all the time.

japanese:
でも、ありがと。
そうやって心配して、守ろうとしてくれる
気持ちだけで、すごく励まされる。
translation:
But, thank you.
It's really encouraging,
having you worry and trying to protect me.

japanese: しかし気持ちだけじゃなんにも……。
translation: However, feelings alone can't do anything...

japanese:
いいの。
だって君は、私の事情なんて他人事だって
知らん顔してることだってできるんだよ？
translation:
It's fine though.
There is no need to worry about other people's affairs
like that, let alone my own, you know?

japanese:
（他人事になんて……思えるかよ。
　今日までの１年間に築かれた俺とこいつらの
　関係は、そこまで浅いものじゃない）
translation:
(Someone else's problem... No way I'd think that.
 The relationship between me and these guys that's
 been built over the past year is not that shallow.)

japanese: （だが、ここで俺にできることなんて……）
translation: (But what can I do here...)

japanese: うん、君に励ましてもらって元気出た！
translation: Hey, you encouraged me, and cheered me up!

japanese:
そうだよ、これは私の夢なんだから、
もうダメかもなんて落ち込んでる場合じゃない。
translation:
That's right, this is my dream.
It's not the time to be depressed 
thinking I might not be able to do it anymore.

japanese:
戻ったら社長と話してなんとかするから、
フータロー君は、そんなに心配しないでね。
translation:
When I get back, I'll talk to my boss
and do something about it,
so don't worry so much, Futaro.

japanese: 一花……。
translation: Ichika...

japanese: じゃあ、この話はこれでおしまいで――
translation: Okay, now let's wrap this up here%p-2;――

japanese: お姉さんと君だけの、秘密だぞ？
translation: This is our little secret, okay? Just between you and me.

japanese: そうもいかない。
translation: I don't know about that.

japanese:
どうして？
ちゃんと説明したじゃない。
translation:
Why not?
I explained things to you, right?

japanese:
確かに一花の事情はわかった。
だが、あいつらにこの話を秘密にしておくのは
違うんじゃないか？
translation:
I now understand what's going on with you, Ichika.
But, I don't think it's a good idea
to keep this a secret from them.

japanese: ……わかった。
translation: ...Got it.

japanese: 言ってることと顔があってないぞ？
translation: Your face and what you're saying don't match, you know?

japanese: 気のせいだ。
translation: You're just imagining things.

japanese:
そうかなぁ。
明らかに顔は、放っておけないって言ってる。
translation:
I wonder.
Your face clearly says you can't leave this alone.

japanese:
……ああ、そうだよ。
悪かったな、隠し事もできないようなタチで。
translation:
...Yeah, you're right.
My bad, not being able to keep things a secret.

japanese: みんなも心配してるんだぞ。
translation: Everyone's worried about you, you know.

japanese:
そっか。
ホントに我が妹ながら、いい子ばかりだ。
translation:
Is that so.
My little sisters, they're all truly good people.

japanese:
そんないい子たちを心配させていいのか？
姉として。
translation:
Is it alright to make such good sisters worry so much?
As their big sister.

japanese:
俺は、兄として、
らいはを心配させるようなことはしないぞ。
translation:
As her big brother,
I wouldn't do anything to make Raiha worry.

japanese:
姉として、か。
みんなには言えない、
フータロー君にしか言えない台詞だね。
translation:
As their big sister, huh.
I can't say it to everyone.
It's something I can only say to you, Futaro-kun.

japanese:
（あいつらは俺を信じて任せてくれた。
　なのに、何もなかったなんて言えるかよ）
translation:
(They believed in me
 and let me handle things with Ichika.
 How could I tell them that it was nothing?)

japanese:
じゃあ、こうしよう。
ここでの話は終わりだけど、
あとはフータロー君に任せるよ。
translation:
Alright, let's do this.
We'll end the conversation here,
but I'll leave things up to you after this, Futaro-kun.

japanese: 虫がよすぎる話だけどさ。
translation: Though it's such a selfish topic.

japanese:
いや、いい。
お前としては、それが最大の譲歩だろう。
translation:
No, it's fine.
That's a huge compromise coming from you.

japanese: ズルくて、ごめんね。
translation: Sorry for being dishonest earlier.

japanese:
（なんだよ、この違和感は。
　あいつ、他にも何か
　隠していることがあるんじゃ……）
translation:
(What's with this strange feeling?
 She's hiding something else, isn't she...)
